name: Crystal Fortress
description: Working on the Shopify eCommerce platform, I helped create and maintain the website. I also assist with back-end tasks: plugins, data management, customer service, internal company structure and organization.

name: Just-for-Fun Games
description: Some games I have created from tutorials to help improve my coding knowledge. I also made some custom changes to challenge myself further.

name: Squirrel
description: I created squirrel to help me track my daily food intake and weight loss progress for a medically supervised approach to weight loss and a healthy lifestyle.
